slash_commands.name: li
slash_commands.description: Generate LinkedIn thought leadership content using the established workflow - examines Clippings folder, applies LinkedIn Post prompt template, and creates content following all formatting rules

slash_commands.name: both
slash_commands.description: Generate both LinkedIn and Short Form social content from same source material - creates LinkedIn post (2800 chars) and 5 short-form posts (280 chars each) for scheduled posting

slash_commands.name: sf
slash_commands.description: Generate Short Form social content only - creates 5 Twitter/X posts (280 chars each) with specific time slots and formats for thought leadership content

slash_commands.name: bush
slash_commands.description: Sequential dual-prompt content generator - processes through Bush Hook Writer and Bush Post Creator

slash_commands.name: erica
slash_commands.description: Generate 4 distinct social media posts using Erica frameworks - creates Absurdist Conspiracy, Problem-Agitation-Solution, Declarative Expertise, and Vulnerable Self-Reflection posts

slash_commands.name: lian
slash_commands.description: Generate LinkedIn thought leadership content using Lian frameworks - creates posts using Personal Stories & Life Lessons, LinkedIn Growth Tactics, Business Strategy & Frameworks, Psychology & Human Behavior, or Contrarian Reality Checks formats

slash_commands.name: liz
slash_commands.description: Generate contrarian marketing thought leadership content - creates posts using Problem Reframing, Direct Advisory, Strategic Perspective, or Satirical Commentary formats that challenge industry norms

slash_commands.name: vanderbilt
slash_commands.description: Generate viral international opportunity content - creates posts about residency programs, citizenship pathways, tax optimization, and global mobility solutions using 10 specialized formats
